attributes.action: The Proposed Development of an Academy in the Durham City Area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The council are trying to turn belmont and gilesgate into an academy i.e knocking both down and building a new school god knows where.
I have been to 2 consultation meetings and neither of them have answered any questions posed to them, instead they have just waffled on about how good academy's are.I speak from first hand experience that they dont work as my son used to go to one.
I have spoke to many people from teachers,pupils to parents and residents and none that i have spoke to wont it,please help as the council dont appear to be listening we only have to the 20th march.
